channel.title: How to make items for owner/admin only
channel.description: Does anyone know how to make any items for owner/admin only such as weapon or rares.

item.title: How to make items for owner/admin only
item.dc:creator: @awesom awesom
item.description:
@awesom wrote:

That does’nt work but im not sure if i am putting in correct place its confusing…?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make items for owner/admin only

item.title: How to make items for owner/admin only
item.dc:creator: @yar_nova yar nova
item.description:
@yar_nova wrote:

You should’nt realy make rares admin only, but it’s up to you…
This should work:
find

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot)

and under

			int CLRanged = GetCLRanged(wearID);

add

			int CLRights = GetCLRights(wearID);

under

if (CLRanged > playerLevel[playerRanged]) { sendMessage("You need " + CLRanged + " " + statName[playerRanged] + " to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; }
ass

if (CLRights > playerRights) { sendMessage("You need Mod Level " + CLRights + " to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; }

Add this void:

public int GetCLRights(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 0; } else if(ItemID == 1053) { return 3; } else if(ItemID == 1050) { return 3; } return 0; }

Just an example, makes santas and green masks admin only to weild.
Add a

else if(ItemID == ItemID) { return 3; }
For admin items,

else if(ItemID == ItemID) { return 2; }
For staff items,
and

else if(ItemID == ItemID) { return 1; }
For mod items.

Read full topic
